title: 30 Early Black Friday Deals Worth Snagging on Amazon
description: Including discounts on designer fashion, editor-loved beauty products, and tons of Apple tech.
excerpt: Here, shop the best early Black Friday Amazon deals on designer fashion, editor-loved beauty products, Apple tech, and more.

A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level, helping readers determine what's worth buying. When she’s not writing for ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Town & Country, Esquire, Cosmopolitan and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
html:
An Overdue Tech Upgrade

Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)

Looking to finally make the jump to AirPods? The second-generation Pro model, offering crisp audio and active noise-cancellation technology, can currently be yours for $170.

A Chic Coffee Table Book

Valentino: Themes and Variations by Pamela Golbin

Before presenting his first collection for Valentino this fall, Alessandro Michele logged countless hours in the Italian fashion house’s archives. Now, you can essentially do the same thing with this stunning coffee table book.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Discounted Designer Handbag

Coach Soft Pebble Leather Cary Shoulder Bag

Amazon’s ever-expanding selection of designer fashion already includes hundreds of Black Friday-level discounts. Example A: This white Coach carry-all worthy of a spot in any wardrobe.

Classic Sunnies

Ray-Ban RB3682 Square Sunglasses

Given these sleek metal-frame Ray-Bans are currently half off, it’s worth grabbing a pair to wear now and one to gift later.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Holiday Travel Essential

Samsonite Framelock Max Hardside Luggage

Now’s the time to revamp your luggage for holiday travels. This lightweight Samsonite hard-side suitcase is under $200, so you’ll have enough left in your budget to grab a discounted carry-on, too.

A Better Night’s Sleep

Nectar Medium Firm Gel Memory Foam Mattress (Queen)

Why spend one more restless night on your current mattress when you can already score this reviewer-loved Nectar mattress for a fraction of the cost?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Celeb-Approved Hair Tool

Wavytalk 5-in-1 Curling Wand Set

Sabrina Carpenter’s hairstylist used this versatile curling wand to create the pop star’s signature bouncy looks during her Short n’ Sweet Tour. And now, you can grab the device on sale for just $50.

A Skincare Restock

Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask (16-Count)

Amazon’s early Black Friday sale is a great opportunity to stock up on best-selling skincare products, like this viral hydrating sheet mask ELLE editors love.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Versatile Basic

Levi’s ’94 Baggy Jeans

Meet your new favorite jeans. Levi’s ’94 Baggy style is ultra-versatile with its classic black wash and mid-rise, straight-leg fit.

New Headphones

Beats Studio Pro x Kim Kardashian

Kim Kardashian’s latest Beats collab is currently $160 off on Amazon, so there’s no need to wait until Black Friday to snag her trendy monochrome over-ear headphones.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Life-Like Christmas Tree

National Tree Company Pre-Lit 'Feel Real’ Artificial Tree

If you’re the type to deck the halls early, take advantage of Amazon’s pre-Black Friday deals on Christmas trees, garlands, wreaths, and other seasonal decor essentials. Grab this reviewer-loved, pre-lit artificial tree while it’s half off, and you can have it up and ready when Thanksgiving guests arrive.

A Holiday Candle

Homesick Winter Mantel Scented Candle

Grab some gorgeous holiday scents to burn during your Thanksgiving gathering. This wintery Homesick candle stars notes of fir and holly berries that you’ll want to sniff all season long.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Oprah’s Favorite Pajamas

Cozy Earth Soft Woven Long Sleeve Pajama Set

The sumptuous Cozy Earth pajamas from Oprah’s Favorite Things 2024 are already 20 percent off on Amazon. “I would buy these striped pajamas in every one of the available colors—that’s how good they are,” Oprah wrote in her annual gift guide.

A Surefire Gift for Anyone

Kate Spade New York Knott Pebbled Leather Shoulder Bag

You’d be hard-pressed to find someone on your list who wouldn’t like this versatile Kate Spade shoulder bag. From college students to picky mothers-in-law, this sleek, timeless style pleases all—including you, since it’s under $300.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Guest Bedroom Upgrade

DG Casa Solid Wood Storage Platform Bed Frame (Queen)

Spruce up your guest bedroom with this storage bed frame before your in-laws visit for the holidays. The space-saving drawers will do wonders to hide clutter.

This Popular Hair Removal Method

Braun Silkexpert Pro5 IPL Device

Start using this top-rated IPL device now, and your skin will be silky smooth by the time your spring vacation rolls around.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Quick Party Host Gift

Bubbly: A Collection of Champagne and Sparkling Cocktails by Colleen Jeffers

Paired with your favorite bottle of bubbles, this champagne cocktail recipe book makes an easy last-minute gift for any frequent host.

A Splurge-Worthy Skincare Device

iRestore LED Light Therapy Face Mask

Take your skincare routine to the next level with this iRestore LED face mask that provides red, blue, and infrared light therapy. With consistent use, you can expect to see firmer, smoother, and brighter skin in as little as six weeks.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Taylor Swift’s Exact Shoes

Sam Edelman Jildie Slingback Mary Jane Heels

A Last-Minute Mani

Glamnetic Press On Nails

It can be hard to find time for a manicure appointment when the holiday season gets busy. Grab this $15 set of Glamnetic press-on nails so you have a party-ready mani whenever needed.

Sarah Maberry is a fashion and luxury commerce editor at Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level, helping readers determine what's worth buying. When she’s not writing for ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Town & Country, Esquire, Cosmopolitan and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
